name: atom-transcribe
description: A very simple player for audiofiles for speech to text transcription. Based on sdinesh86's atom-music.

smallSkip.title: Small skip.
smallSkip.description: Duration of a small skip (backward or forward) in seconds. Milliseconds are possible to add.

bigSkip.title: Big skip.
bigSkip.description: Duration of a big skip (backward or forward) in seconds. Milliseconds are possible to add.

pauseSkip.title: Pause skip.
pauseSkip.description: Seconds to go backwards after each pause.
